translation.title: The Interior Will Be Impermanent in the Future

next.name: The Interior Is Impermanent in the Present

previous.name: The Interior Was Impermanent in the Past

segments.en: 187. The Interior Will Be Impermanent in the Future

segments.pli: “Cakkhu, bhikkhave, aniccaṃ anāgataṃ … pe … jivhā aniccā anāgatā … pe … mano anicco anāgato.
segments.en: “Mendicants, in the future the eye, ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind will be impermanent …”

sections.title: “Mendicants, in the future the eye, ear, nose, tongue,…

suttaplex.translated_title: The Interior Will Be Impermanent in the Future
